Interface TruffleObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTruffleException, ContinuationResult, DynamicObject, HiddenKey
public interface TruffleObject
Interface for any entity of a Truffle guest language implementations that can be shared across other language implementations.
Since:
0.8 or earlier
See Also:
  • to access truffle objects.
